meanings.definition: A person from whom one is descended.
meanings.sent1: My ancestor came to this country many years ago.
meanings.sent2: I am proud of my ancestors and their accomplishments.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my ancestor would have liked modern technology.
meanings.sent4: The roots of my family tree run deep with the stories of my ancestor.
meanings.sent5: Learning about my ancestor's life helps me understand my own identity.

meanings.definition: A plant or animal from which others have evolved.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ancestor of the modern horse looked very different.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fossils to learn more about plant and animal ancestors.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to think about the ancestor of a giant sequoia tree.
meanings.sent4: The ancestor of all birds is believed to be a small dinosaur.
meanings.sent5: The genetic code of an ancestor can reveal much about its descendants.
